title: Anyone else here use Replay.GG?
body: Is it working for you guys? I just tried to watch a replay but it says it can't find me even tho I've used it before. Anyone know what is going on?

replies.body:
Okay I found out that sometimes when Replay.GG's server fails to connect to the Riot servers in a region then it basically stops working. It happens a lot in OCE apparently. Unfortunately, because my game was played in this "down period" I can't watch it. 

Thanks guys for your help anyway.
It's not working for anyone ATM. Not sure what's going on.
Had a name change recently at all? It could also be something to do with the recent patch? I only have very cursory knowledge of the thing so that's all I got I'm afraid.

Nah I've never had a name change. Been DiamondAries since level 1. It could be because of the patch, but then you think it would have a message on the site saying it is down atm because of the patch. I'll try again later tho
Mmm can't help you I'm afraid but good luck, hope you can get it working :)
